Shard.name: UOGamers: Hybrid
Shard.description: Largest and best free shard ever. This shard is run by the RunUO Team. Nearly 10 million items. Over 100,000 active accounts. This is the real deal.

Shard.name: Project X
Shard.description: UOR to LBR game mechanics, Multiple pvp arenas, Tournaments, Unique duel system, Deathmatches, Casino, Quests, Professional and experienced staff.

Shard.name: UO Legends
Shard.description: The biggest Full-ML freeshard over the world.

Shard.name: UO MoonGate II
Shard.description: OSI like with many superb add-ons

Shard.name: Ethereal Realms
Shard.description: Events, Customs, Quests, No Skill Cap, Fast Gains, 375 Stat Cap, No PKs, Paintball, 3 Houses Per Account, Town Housing, Pet Breeding, 10 Follower Slots, Skill Bonus Clothing, Friendly Players, Evil Staff, Dedicated Server, T1, 4gb RAM

Shard.name: Death Awaits You
Shard.description: Many Customs; Evos, Clothes, Wings, Weapons, Monsters, and tons more. Family Shard. Friendly Staff

Shard.name: Angel Island
Shard.description: Felucca only since 3/2004. Balanced PvP, RP and non-RP events, player driven economy, adv. crafting, an alternative to stat loss, varied PvM, and adv. creature AI. Dedicated and mature staff, creative and loyal playerbase. Brought to you by Adam Ant.

Shard.name: DefianceUO: Worldwide
Shard.description: Largest and oldest successful European network. We have UOR and AOS servers, with thousands of daily visitors and the strongest economy making your ingame items worth playing for.

Shard.name: Undiscovered Land
Shard.description: First Czech RunUO server based on OSI concept runing on lastest release of RunUO 2.0.0 with many customs systems. Samurai Empire, Factions, Ethics and Buff icons enabled. Many tournaments and GM moderated quests. Auto account creation.

Shard.name: In Mani Ylem
Shard.description: T2A era style shard with many customizations, but overall a very OSI-style feel. Emphasis on player fame, guilds, economy, and group exploration. New crafting and house deco options, as well as lots of rare creatures to find. 3 houses per account, 6mo decay timer. Come try the best of the old school shards - TUR BRA GER JPN

Shard.name: HighCastle Halls
Shard.description: Felucca/T2A. Role-play encouraged. Pushthrough stamina loss removed. Custom weaving and weedgrowing system. Uber golems. Many custom scripts and quests. Professional, adult staff.

Shard.name: ABCUO v2.0
Shard.description: 3 and a half year old world! No Skill Cap (GM All Skills), 305 Stat Cap (330 with scroll) Custom AOS with the good parts of SE and ML. Fast Paced 4/6 PvP. Daily PVM events. Daily PvP Tournaments.

Shard.name: Crows Kingdom
Shard.description: Canadian Shard,Dedicated Server, No SkillCap,Regs/Tithing,Great Staff,PVP or PVM,Custom Quests,SkillGate and Easy Gains,400 StatCap,5/6,Casino,100% Spawn, ML Crafting,PVP Points Titles and Rewards

Shard.name: UODreams
Shard.description: The biggest free OSI style shard in Europe.

Shard.name: Vetus-Mundus
Shard.description: German RunUO Fun Shard, OSI-like, AoS / SE / ML + more and own features and systems, Skillcap 800 (+25 every 3 months, max. skillcap addition is 100), Statcap 225, with Stat-PS max. 250, 5 maps, only Felucca is PvP and Pk land, shard language is german, but english speakers are welcome. We would be pleased to meet you at our world.

Shard.name: UOGamers: Divinity
Shard.description: This is a T2A era shard run by the RunUO & UOGamers teams. This shard is the best mix of fun and T2A accuracy you can find today! No neon items, no mounts, no statloss, all "old" houses, great staff, tons of fun events!

Shard.name: Age of Avatars
Shard.description: over 300+ new items just added - Totaly Custom Shard - Class/Race/Level Custom OWL, Crafts, Arti's - Custopm Dungeons - adding more almost everyday

Shard.name: Project Blackrock
Shard.description:
Sphere/RunUO rebirth of Santiago/Mythik!
RunUO 2.0: AOS/SE/ML Custom bosses/Items/Quests, continuous development. Tightly knit community. No Trammel, No insta gib guards! Osi Skill caps and a focus on balance.
Sphere 55i: 2000 Skill cap, UOR based rule set. Rampant PVP. Unique crafting items
5 years of development

Shard.name: Paradise Found
Shard.description: Family Shard - No Skill Cap - 325 stats - No PvP - Friendly players and staff. Welcome to Paradise.

Shard.name: Necessary Evil
Shard.description: A T2A style shard, with some interesting changes. This is the direction we would have taken UO after 1999. Helpful staff, PvP and stealing encouraged, no secure housing, many other fun changes.

Shard.name: Akara Essex
Shard.description: Custom Map, Races, Leveling Armour, Weapons - Items - and Jewelry. Runic Smith Hammers, Sewing Kits, Fletching Kits. Custom Ores, Woods, and Leathers. 4 Years Online and Going Strong. New 3 Megabit Upstream, Adult Run Friendly RolePlaying. We are the Creators of the Evolution Dragons Script done by Raelis.

Shard.name: Shazzys Shard
Shard.description: 900 Skill Cap -- 250 Stat Cap Earn your Skills with good gains No Uber-No Skill Gates Nothing but super game play and fun. Custom Resources, Crafting Skills, Creatures and Quests A GREAT place for crafters or adventurers alike! Adult Hosts

Shard.name: Sylvan Heart
Shard.description: Experience the Heart of UO; Sylvan Heart - What was Sylvan dreams is now Sylvan Heart - SE, RP/restricted PvP. 1200/450, Macroing 24/7. Abundance of custom artwork/special wearables/MOBs/player commands/items and other scripts. NO AUTOREG. Requires Patches.

Shard.name: Even
Shard.description: Even ist einer der altesten deutschen Freeshards und baut derzeit auf einem stark modifizierten RunUO Modul auf. Seit uber 5 Jahren hat der Staff versucht Spielern jegliches Spieltyps auf Even ein passendes Ambiente zu liefern. Wir bieten euch ein einzigartiges PvP/Keep System, das standig f√ºr Action sorgt. Desweiteren ist so gut wie jeder Dungeon mit sehr viel Liebe zum Detail aufgearbeitet worden und hat seine eigene Rarequest. Auch Even's Workersystem ist einmalig.

Shard.name: Toxic-Shadows
Shard.description: !Open for test! Let us know what we can add for you! New quests new dungeons soon to be custom maps great staff looking for 2 more staff members

Shard.name: Elysia
Shard.description: AD&D influenced. 5 races, 11 classes. Features a unique leveling system with multi-classing. ML weapons, ML items. Peerless quests. New art, crafting, quests, pets, spells, houses. Looking for a challenge and something new? Join!

Shard.name: The First Empire
Shard.description: "PvP/RP, Fast dedicated server, Professional dedicated staff, Thousands of quests and mini quests, Balanced PvP system. Unique Crafting systems, We are UO at its best ! "

Shard.name: Equilibrium
Shard.description: RunUO 2.0 shard with both Trammel & Felucca, english language only. 700 statscap, custom spawned. Join us and be a part of the development, your opinions count!

Shard.name: A Rogue Existence [ARE]
Shard.description: A.R.E. is a stable and up-to-date Sphere 56b shard with rebuilt skills, thousands of custom items (craftable and findable), unique loot systems, newby quests, and a balanced skillcap. We are small but offer the most! Come and check us out.

Shard.name: Wendelwelt
Shard.description: Deutscher RP-Shard mit freundlicher Community. Komplett neue und detaillierte Map, Dungeons und Gebäude. Flexibles Klassensystem, neues Wiederbelebungssystem und zahlreiche weitere Features. Sehr Einsteigerfreundlich.

Shard.name: MedievalDomain
Shard.description: We offer a family type atmosphere with plenty to keep you busy. Custom resources, pets, stealables, bods system, pet breeding, champ areas & lots of extras. SE spells and ML crafting, dungeons, and elves. Training room, vendor mall, gate room. No skillcap, 500 statcap with orbs to raise statcap and max follower cap. See website!

Shard.name: Raistlins World
Shard.description: Runuo 2.0 Custom faction system & Champ spawns + more check website for details..

Shard.name: Arcodia: New Dawns
Shard.description: The Original Arcodia! 6+yr history, AoS/SE/Partial ML, Customs, Quests, Expanded crafting, Roleplay encouraged, Friendly proffesional staff, Dedicated server on an OC connection and much more! Stop by and see us!

Shard.name: LocalStrike:LS-UO
Shard.description: PvM/PvP All Facets. Evil Players - Faster Gain- Walk Casting - No Caps Skills. Fully Spawned. Server Argentino. Owned by Nora. R.2 ToTs and Perless System! New players start 100/100/100 Stats. R 2Svn 151. Fixes soon! Be ware! SE and ML

Shard.name: Hegemonia
Shard.description: Servidor brasileiro com grande parte traduzida para português. Alem de várias implementações e sistemas únicos. Aprimorado para parecer mais real. Interpretação (RP) encorajada, mas não obrtigatória. Sem limites de habilidades e evolução demorada (hard skill gain). Não requer patch.

Shard.name: YSUO - Yserbius
Shard.description: Roleplay. UO, Good Group of people. Many extras and bonus' to earn, receive, and find. Nothing but fun. Fully updated with new and exciting things regularly.

Shard.name: Aeternum
Shard.description: Unlike anything you have ever seen. No Trammel, Full ML Support. Unique systems, Unique style. Player run economy. Massive crafting systems, massive harvesting systems, custom BOD systems and prizes, custom Champs and Unique mini-champ system and more.

Shard.name: MoonShadowII
Shard.description: A fun filled adult shard featuring exotic homes, custom craftables , custom spawns and art.

Shard.name: Phantasya
Shard.description: Live out your dreams. AOS, SE items, no insurance, customized: world, races and items.

Shard.name: Dark Genesis Reborn
Shard.description: A Roleplay/PvP oriented shard, lots of new ideas and plenty of friendly people to play with. Tons of customs and uniques! 700 skill cap 225 stat cap at first, 800/270 attainable with scrolls. Live birth evo Wolves and Evo Dragons. ML Era shard.

Shard.name: Next~Chapter
Shard.description: Next~Chapter Be the best in your Element: AOS/Balanced/RunUO 2.0/Professional staff (with several rl software developers) and server. Caps ~ 1000/225 4/5 casting (no earrings). Custom storyline and events unlike anything you've seen before. Already the fastest growning community out there. We are here to stay! Join us now!

Shard.name: Renaissance 2
Shard.description: A Ren-era PvP shard with allowed use of KUOC.

Shard.name: Twilight Zone
Shard.description:
NEW! Recipe system, craftable arties, magic craftables now fully working!
ML/SE/AOS, Community Collections, Peerless', Named monster, 100mb connection, fast server. And much more coming soon!

Shard.name: Schattenwelt
Shard.description: Grosser deutscher Freeshard auf RunUO Basis. Schattenwelt ist seit 1999 aktiv und bietet eine solide und zuverlässige Spielumgebung. Unser Bereich liegt in einer bewährten Mischung aus hochwertigem Rollenspiel, ohne dabei den reinen Fun-Faktor von UO zu vernachlässigen.

Shard.name: Libercity Online
Shard.description: Serveur Quebecois pour Ultima Online. Staff et citoyens francais/quebecois. Script avancer. Ville de libercity completement Unique. (Hrp/RP)

Shard.name: Mystical Unicorn
Shard.description: We are a fun, family friendly shard - Kids are allowed as long as they are suitably supervised, we aren't a nursery. We are a no PvP shard ( except for occasional events ). We have many custom items, quests and ridables and high loot gain, as well as an experience level system.

Shard.name: Sylvannia UO
Shard.description: Servidor Ultima Online : Mondain's Legacy gratuito. Infinidad de sistemas automáticos. Staff profesional con gran experiencia.

Shard.name: Xzandras Dream
Shard.description: UO 2.0 Shard. Old style game with a twist. Custom monsters and lots of quests. Helpful and friendly staff. PVP in Fel with Fel rules. Events for players weekly. We challenge you to Dream Xzandras Dream

Shard.name: WoSX
Shard.description: Fully spawned AoS shard, all facets. Blend of UO:R, Pre-UO:R and AoS rules. PVP & PVM Lots of customs, items, systems, town housing... Has some adult content, discretion is advised.

Shard.name: Europa 2
Shard.description: Osi based, some ML, 2 year old shard, Great staff and players, character transfer from most shards. Advanced character purchase from ingame gold, Join us today!

Shard.name: Current Online World
Shard.description: Fun for all with an easy twist, All skills up to 220 (with powerscrolls). 375 stat cap (with statscrolls). Several quests. Up to Five houses per account. RunUO 2.0 Lots of craftables. and custom items

Shard.name: Guardians of Paradise
Shard.description: Run UO 2.0, Full Elven items and mobiles, Welcome Packs and House Warming gift pack, Family Fun Shard. No Skill Cap, 500 Stat Cap. 35 Quests to date, custom woods, leathers and ores + marble. Waxcrafting, Wine making, painting craft,harvest system, Custom monsters to fight + staff run events. PvP and PvM events will be held.

Shard.name: Goddess Revived
Shard.description: 1320 Skill Cap - 400 Stat Cap, Champs, Custom Creatures, Decor, Hues and Items. Druid Spells System. Friendly Staff, 100% Spawned, Including ML Peerless creatures and Guantlet. Skara Casino, New Custom Dungeons, Custom Creatures from New Player to Uber Vet. Over 20 levelable items. Races, Skill trainers and one of the most beautiful worlds around. Easy rez. Fast Server. Stable Connection. 4 New Creatures added this week alone (allwith thier own armor & weapon sets)

Shard.name: Splitterwelt
Shard.description: Splitterwelt - Ein Freeshard auf dem Rollenspiel gefordert und erwünscht, aber nicht zwingend ständig erforderlich ist. Viele Features, ein freundlicher, hilfsbereiter Staff und viel Spaß. Anmeldung erforderlich.

Shard.name: Age Of Darkness
Shard.description: New AoS server with many custom, PvP/RP come try us !! 4 gig of rams ! Download the patch at http://ageofdarkness.net/patch/

Shard.name: The Garden
Shard.description: 1500/300 Skill/Stat cap. We have a Start Pack for new players. We have lots of customs. We have a Friendly and Interactive staff. Player events. Veteran Rewards. Staff Custom Dungeons and Tames. Many custom quests. Please join us!

Shard.name: Wireplay Lothlorien
Shard.description:
We are a UK based shard that has been running for over 5 years by a dedicated staff team.
Some of the features we have to offer are: - Balanced PvP System - Bounty System - Custom Craftables - Custom Dungeons - Custom Housing - Duel System (1v1 and Team) - Experience System - Runic Weapons - Ship Building and Cannons
The skill cap is 900%. The stat cap is 300, with a maximum of 115 point in each stat.

Shard.name: Lost Lands Of UO
Shard.description: No skill cap!! Web for all the info!! pvp,pvm,Craft galore!! The server has been running for over 2 years. ML is fully spawned along with all the house addons. 2 houses per account and 2 accounts allowed. Tons of custom items, artifacts, and scripts. Come try us out!!!!

Shard.name: UO Rising Hybrid
Shard.description: RP/PVM Shard. Lots of customs including, custom ores, woods, leathers, and advanced cooking system and Bio Engineering. Embued weapons system, and lots of quest coming. Very friendly and mature player and staff. Skill cap 800 ... Come play in our little world and see a new side of UO.

Shard.name: Avatar's Kingdom
Shard.description: Our planed features are: Custom Races, Ores Woods, Leathers, and Many Spell/Ability classes, as well as many unique towns and dungeons. Please see our web page for details.

Shard.name: Simply Reborn
Shard.description: Fun and friendly place to relax and play. Over 25 quests to do. All facets used. PVP/PK only in Felucca. The new bods added. Taming advantages are present in the game. Fast gains and advanced gates at starting area. Many crafting systems to do. Working Factions System. Just come and see for yourself and then you will see we are worth while to play.

Shard.name: Lords of Ancara
Shard.description: We have over 130 custom creatures! Custom quests, pet breeding, and no skill caps make Ancara a guild friendly, family shard. Dedicated server & fast network = no lag!

Shard.name: UOLegends
Shard.description: UO Legends is trying to repeat your old experiences. Legends enables the players to once again adventure in a truly ongoing world. A world where battles are fought once again with might and mind, alliances are once again formed and shattered, and both enemies and friends are just as interested in wealth and power as you are. Slay the dragon, form a government, join a guild, craft and sell wares, and meet your friends at the tavern.

Shard.name: Oblivion Shard
Shard.description:
PvM Balanced, 10 custom races, 70+ quests, daily GM events, Great playerbase and staff.
FAMILY SHARD, no bad language or harassing allowed. Almost no pk.
6 years Online. Dedicated server & lines. Own development with unique scripts RP encouraged, but not required.

Shard.name: Heavens Fury
Shard.description: Non PVP Family Orientated Shard that starts with 150 each stat and 120 each Skill... TONS of Custom Monsters, quests, clothing, armor hair, citys, dungeons and many many more things i cant begin to mention!!

Shard.name: Ghrome Core [GC]
Shard.description: Rp, Pvp, Pvm, No rules shard, fast skill gains, no regs, Skills Caps 8000.0, Drop systeme rare and normal items.All Systeme custom scripts.Staff of 4 Game Master 9 years experience shard host.All are welcome to Ghrom Core!

Shard.name: Crimson Waters
Shard.description: Great place to call home with 2 houses and a Townhouse. Family Owned and Run. We go out of our way to be different. Never ending Custom Crafting system like you have never seen before. Tons of deco for the decorator and lots of arties for the hunter. No skill cap and stats cap 500 with fast gains. Some custom maps, custom dungeons and custom NPCs. Renaissance Festival Event is the only place to find PVP here and its all old school PVP and in a controlled atmosphere.

Shard.name: Aude Sapere
Shard.description: RunUO2.0 custom shard we welcome any and all players.We have a 300 stat capand 1500 skill cap. 5fully spawned facets. custom hues,factions,pvp,custom houses,mobs,items also alot of quests. Come join us for a great experience at Aude SApere

Shard.name: Shadows Of Darkness
Shard.description: 6/6fc/fcr/Free Arties!/120 All Skills/PVP/PK/NewHost/Faster

Shard.name: Forged Worlds
Shard.description: Players are able to place 5 Houses and Link up to 3 w/o GM help, Customs Galor! Vet rewards after 1 week .Skill Caps Increases with age of account. Come play with our Friendly Staff. 1000.0 Starting Skills, 350 Skill cap EVERY useable item is a Lvl item! Craftable Artys, Evo and Mercs, 2 years Exp Running Shards :) Players can buy almost Static building! Awesome Casino for those that have the habit!,Self Res with NO cost! Custom Hue Sytem...

Shard.name: Edge of Paradise
Shard.description: We are a RunUO 1.0 server, offering: **NO PK / NO PvP** Tamer's Haven Crafter's Haven Ample starting skills, gold, and resources Lots of customs you'll only find here Optional Skill/Stat Gate - You Choose Training room, and skill trainers Socketing System / Pet Leveling System Many Customs & Custom Crafting Systems Adult Staff - Not Hiring

Shard.name: Age Of Rogues
Shard.description: Age of Rogues is balanced and still offers things that will intregue you. All facets are enabled and fully spawned, Felucca, Trammel, Malas, Ilshenar, and Tokuno. Champ spawns can be found in Felucca, Tokuno, and Ilshenar. There is a dark side of the world, murderers, scoundrels, and traitors. Yet where there is darkness there is always light.

Shard.name: World of Dragons
Shard.description: Custom Monsters/Tamables and Craftables/Boosted Pet Leveling System/Evos and Mercs/Custom towns come join the challange.

Shard.name: Darkwind Online
Shard.description: A new shard in development with a Semi-RP Emphasis. Encourage player run economy with player run towns, and active Role-played confrontation. Small player base, but looking to keep going up. Come join this infant shard. See site for details on rule's, connecting, community and how you can help out Darkwind Online.

Shard.name: Avatars Legacy
Shard.description: ---Description only in polish language--- Jedyny w Polsce shard zbudowany w oparciu o realia serii gier Ultima. Avatar juz nigdy nie powroci, przyszlosc Britanni lezy w rekach jej mieszkancow. Mechanika zblizona do OSI (AoS + elementy pozniejszych dodatkow). Dla chetnych klimatyczna gra i eventy! !! main language is polish !!

Shard.name: Archeronne
Shard.description: What can we really say just yet... We're working on it :)

Shard.name: Dragons Den
Shard.description: Rule a town or rule the lands, gain titles from staff as your popularity grows. Fight back the ever growing dragons of the land. runs on runuo 1.0

Shard.name: World Of Wizardlord
Shard.description: Advanced Roleplaying shard, Several Races, Opposing race wars, Completely Player Based Economy, "New Era" world in beta stages but is fully functional.

Shard.name: Mystic Retreat
Shard.description: 1200 skill cap, 300 stat cap. RunUO 2 SVN162. Custom quests, mobiles, mounts, deco etc. Fineous' Static Housing!

Shard.name: Legends of Hope
Shard.description: Fun and Very Unique Shard, with lots of Customs. Family Oriented, with PvM and PvP. We are an independant and customised shard, which aims to offer a fun and challenging alternative to the standard game. We have a unique race system - new players can choose to become either Wood Elf, Dark Elf, High Elf, Githyanki, Angel, Half-Orc, Daemon-Kin or Human. There is unique armour, items and quests for each specific race

Shard.name: UO: Sosarian Adventures
Shard.description: A South African UO shard with an alternative PvP system based on racial alliances. A true RP shard. There are many NPC quests scattered, some short, others epic. Other events are organised by staff.

Shard.name: Eastern Cove
Shard.description: Eastern Cove is now a 100% Pre AoS shard. No regs,Factions,CTF,DD and more to come. Come and make your dreams come true.

Shard.name: The Genesis Shard
Shard.description: Enforced role-playing, comfortable and friendly community. Enterprise-scale, professional grade dedicated hosting Completely unique character creation: more than forty races, each with a special bonus and/or ability, more than fifteen classes balanced and time-tested. Large-scale and small-scale quests and events, always providing your characters a chance to improve or degrade the world they live in. Enhanced logging for your security and trust. Completely custom world maps, creatures, and towns. Player bounty system with defeatable town guards

Shard.name: DragonsTreasure
Shard.description: Family Shard Many Quests Evolution Dragon, Hiryu, and Angels. No Skill Cap 325 Stat Cap. Free Bonded Pet Free Training Armor and Training Elemental Provided. Afk Macroing allowed. Token System, custom ores, custom woods, custom leathers, more artifacts at Doom, and casino. Come Join us!!

Shard.name: Medieval Dream
Shard.description: Family style no PK. Fun solo or party adventurer's quests in instanced dungeon, spawns automatically adjust to players' level! Many totally unique scripts: player town guard, pre-AOS/AOS/custom hybrid combat, unique bardic gameplay, custom crop/plants, a unique crafting and enhancing system. Other custom features including henchman, town invasion, exp based skill gain, buy skill with gold. Expect mature players.

Shard.name: Age of Light
Shard.description: 1200 skill cap/300 stat cap, customs, quests, owltr, friendly.

Shard.name: Game Master Training Area
Shard.description: Register on forum to become GM. Everyone is GM, no lag, great uptime. ALL commands as GM!

Shard.name: Land of Fantasy
Shard.description: A shard base in the UO:R era, with a few AOS features, such as housing. Family friendly with a knowledgeable staff. Come check us out today. (Website Coming Soon!)

Shard.name: Heavens Vally
Shard.description: State cap 325, No skillcap, champ,factions,great staff, events,and good times!

Shard.name: TLEA: The Life Ever After
Shard.description: A hardcore roleplay shard which focuses on a sense of community and thought provoking storylines. An original UO experience.

Shard.name: Dark Saints
Shard.description: Crafters Paradise. See Forums Today =:-{)~

Shard.name: Mystics Of Chaos GM World
Shard.description: Gm World (GameMaster On Login) *Read Rules In Website Before Entering

Shard.name: Realm Of Arcadia
Shard.description: We offer encouraged RP, custom items/art, mobiles, systems and over 40 quests.. There are guild owned and ran towns with PvP allowed in 2 facets. The caps are 1400/250. As well as a welcome pack for joining.

Shard.name: Celtic Gardens
Shard.description: A family oriented shard.Events, Quests, Running on runuo 2.0. No skill cap. stat cap 225 each stat. Crafter Friendly. Fast skill gain. Controlled economy.

Shard.name: Immortal Myths
Shard.description: ~Adult Shard~2.0~Friendly Staff~ Custom Art~ Events~

Shard.name: Cryptic Realms
Shard.description: A Family Shard, with 325/1400 Skill and Stat Caps... Custom Dungeons and all the facets open including mondain dungeons! New Monsters and artifacts, come and enjoy..

Shard.name: Aedilis
Shard.description: Our current server offers AOS era gameplay with a few SE features. There are four facets available. Our features include custom ores, instance dungeons, weapon/armor augments, multiple housing plots, pet leveling and much more. One word of warning though, we are currently planning a world wipe (may) and an upgrade to 2.0. Come check us out and see what the world of Aedilis can do for you.

Shard.name: Seventh Heaven
Shard.description: Family Friendly Shard.No Skill Cap (so each Char can have all skillls or just have one char) - 300 Stat Cap, Champs, Custom Creatures, Custom Areas,PvP in Felucca. We have Druid, Ranger, Cleric, Bard and Undead Spells System. Friendly Staff, 100% Spawned, New players get a small house and gold and skills are set to gain quickly. Easy rez. Become Member on web page to keep up on all that is happening in the game.

Shard.name: Champion of Virtues
Shard.description: RP All Facet Shard, 300 stats / 1000 skills , Newbie starting area with skill stone & race stone optional . Many quests some custom for this shard only. New & some revamped systems like cooking , harvesting, crafting ect... Great Tutor npcs to help the new player to helping a vet with new systems. Some custom patches. Mature staff

Shard.name: Angels Of Heaven
Shard.description: Role Play And Pvp Mondain's Legacy Version Need Latest Osi Patch Client 5.0.9.1 ..

Shard.name: An Nox
Shard.description:
Good ol' days of Minoc & Vesper * Loot Sharing * LOS Thiefing * Random Encounters * Classes * Slot Machines * Free Fantasy Weapons *
*You must be Scottish because you just got Kilt *

Shard.name: Realm of Shadows
Shard.description: Family Shard, Full Skills, Fast Gains, No PKs, Events, Customs, Quests, Town Housing, Friendly Players, Continuous Development. with More Quests Items Locations to Come! Levelable Characters, Levelable Items, Weapons, Clothing, Pet Leveling. Join us Today!

Shard.name: Shady Haven
Shard.description: Attentive staff! The best in balanced game play. Hybrid LBR, AOS, SE, best things from each incarnation. 800 Skill limit, 285 stat limit, MACROING ALLOWED! PVP/PVM no Trammel, 18 ores, new leathers and woods, custom quests, player owned buildings in town, high speed connection, player commands, enhanced archery system, auction system, and much more.

Shard.name: In Vas Nox
Shard.description: AOS No skill cap, 3/6 PvP, Fast skill gain. Old school AOS

Shard.name: Moonshadow
Shard.description: Customs , stealable rares, 120 most skills on one character. Many housing options available ,great crafting .

Shard.name: Zwei Monde
Shard.description: Deutscher Rollenspielshard mit 3 Facetten, 720 Skill-/255 Statpunkten die sofort bei Charerstellung verteilt werden können, da unser Augenmerk auf RP und nicht auf Skillgaining liegt.

Shard.name: World War III
Shard.description: A custom designed map with many unique features. Felucca ruleset only with AOS features. New unique content being added, see forums for all the details

Shard.name: Holy Conquest UO
Shard.description: Realism based shard with plenty of custom scripts without straying to far from traditional UO.

Shard.name: Empires
